short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the effecting positioned element to debug absolute positioning issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Figuring out how things are being effected when you are trying to use "position: absolute" is tough. This helps by showing you what elements are effecting the positioning of your element by making a colored background over any element that is changing your position.
